{{cpp/atomic/atomic/title|operator T}}
{{cpp/atomic/atomic/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++11|
operator T() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++11|
operator T() const volatile noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Atomically loads and returns the current value of the atomic variable. Equivalent to {{c|load()}}.

{{rrev|since=c++20|
It is deprecated if {{c|std::atomic&lt;T&gt;::is_always_lock_free}} is {{c|false}} and overload {{v|2}} participates in overload resolution.
}}

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The current value of the atomic variable.
